original_title: ラブライブ！スーパースター!! Liella! 3rd LoveLive! Tour ～WE WILL!!～
overview: ラブライブ！スーパースター!! Liella! 3rd LoveLive! Tour ~WE WILL!!~ is Liella!'s third solo live concert tour that took place in Xebio Arena Sendai in Miyagi, Sendai on December 3rd 2022, and was broadcast to select theatres across Japan.
title: Love Live! Superstar!! Liella! 3rd LoveLive! Tour ～WE WILL!!～
